channel.title: Docker on Jekst
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Jekst

item.title: Docker Webservice
item.description: Mysql 1docker run -d -v /Users/User/data/dbdata:/var/lib/mysql --name mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=llqwe mysql:latest Redis 1docker run -d --name=redis -p 6379:6379 redis:alpine

item.title: 自定义Docker镜像
item.description: 以制作redis镜像为例，讲一下docker镜像制作及push到仓库流程 1.编写Dockerfile 1FROMalpine:latest2# install redis3RUN apk add redis 4# expose port5EXPOSE63796# start redis server7CMD ["redis-server "]2.创建镜像 1docker build -t redis:0.0.1 . 3.登陆仓库 1docker login --username=username registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com 4.镜像打标签 1 2docker tag redis:0.0.1 registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/jekst/redis:0.0.1 5.上传镜像 1docker push registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/jekst/redis:0.0.1
